input.name: __VIEWSTATE

span.center: The Kirtland Local Schools will close at the end of the school day on March 13 and remain closed through the end of the 2019-20 school year.

div.span: Governor DeWine announced that school buildings in Ohio will remain closed and students will continue to learn remotely for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year. We realize the stress that comes with this announcement for our families, but we appreciate your efforts staying on task with our online learning program. In the coming days/week, we will be communicating what the next steps will be for the rest of the school year.

span.p: Governor DeWine announced that school buildings in Ohio will remain closed and students will continue to learn remotely for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year. We thank our families and staff for their patience and support during this unique time. Remember, we are all in this together!
Below is a list of other events that have been postponed or cancelled.

ul.li: The Kirtland Playgroud is closed until further notice.
6th Grade Camp, Chicago Tour, Washington Tour (cancelled)
